description.value: Code system of concepts specifying to what the subject is consenting, i.e. what type of service, surgical procedure, information access/release or other event. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the TXA and CON segments.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0496 (Consent Type)

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
